column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The sides were fine. The mashed potatoes were interesting. I love garlic
column2: but didn't really like biting into a whole clove of garlic even though it was roasted. The elote was
column4: I can't for the life of me understand why it's getting all of the acclaim it's getting. It was just sweet corn bathed in a mayo/sriachi sauce with a bit of lime and a tiny bit of cilantro.
